meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Craig Campbell Deb Coester Alison Whitney Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1060.

td.p: Craig Campbell, an advertising executive from Victorville, California
Deb Coester, an accounting clerk from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Alison Whitney, a preschool director & teacher from Orlando, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $11,699)

tr.td: FAMOUS WOMEN
SONG LYRICS
U.S. CITIES
SPORTS
SEWING
"LING" O
